import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { vrInfo } from 'src/vrInfo'; import { HEADSETS } from '../mock-vrInfo'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vrinfo', templateUrl: './vrinfo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vrinfo.component.css'] }) export class VRInfoComponent implements OnInit { headsetsList = HEADSETS; ngOnInit(): void { } sendOSC() { fetch("http://localhost:3000/VRHeadsets"); //http://localhost:3000/DownloadAssets/VR1 } }

VR list
